attributes.action: ban the use of organophosphate insecticides and pay compensation to those people who became seriously ill complying with the statutory  use of these products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: organophosphates are nerve damaging agents that were used in the first world war. until recently farmers were required to dip their sheep in these products in the mistaken belief that they would control a sheep infection called scrapie. unfortunately, some people reacted adversley to organophosphates and are now unable to work, have lost their livelihoods and live in severe pain and other major symptoms such as extreme fatigue. these organophosphates are extremely dangerous chemicals that should be banned.
